Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.products

Class LearningResource

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.DatabaseObject
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.products.Product
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.data.products.LearningResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class LearningResource extends Product
Represents a learning resource, such as a book or manual, with additional attributes specific to learning resources.

This class extends the general Product class and includes attributes such as ISBN, organization, release date, and edition number.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • LearningResource

      public LearningResource(int price, int quantity, String title, String description, UUID sellerId, int fidelityPoints, String isbn, String organisation, LocalDate releaseDate, LearningResourceType type, int editionNumber) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a LearningResource with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      price - The price of the learning resource.
      quantity - The quantity available.
      title - The title of the learning resource.
      description - The description of the learning resource.
      sellerId - The UUID of the seller offering the learning resource.
      fidelityPoints - The fidelity points associated with the learning resource.
      isbn - The ISBN of the learning resource.
      organisation - The organization or publisher of the learning resource.
      releaseDate - The release date of the learning resource.
      type - The type of learning resource (printed or electronic).
      editionNumber - The edition number of the learning resource.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided edition number is negative.
